price: 3 Tu vas peut-être te consumer de tristesse devant leur refus obstiné d’embrasser la foi.
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
